description.value: An extension to add a reference to zib-MedicalDevice to Goal.target in zib-FunctionalOrMentalStatus that is modelled inline in zib-TreatmentObjective.

purpose.value: This extension represents the MedicalDevice concept of [zib FunctionalOrMentalStatus v3.2(2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/FunctionalOrMentalStatus-v3.2(2020EN))

copyright.value: Copyright and related rights waived via CC0, https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/. This does not apply to information from third parties, for example a medical terminology system. The implementer alone is responsible for identifying and obtaining any necessary licenses or authorizations to utilize third party IP in connection with the specification or otherwise.

definition.value: Medical aid the patient has to reduce the impact of the disability or disorder.
